alert.note: Alert for Clay; Coosa; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 9:27AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tallapoosa, northeastern Coosa and southwestern Clay Counties through 1000 AM CST... At 927 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hanover, or near Stewartville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Goodwater, Rockford, Kellyton, Stewartville, Hillabee Creek, Hanover, Bradford, Bentleyville, Parkdale, Hatchet, Crewsville, Northern Lake Martin, Cleveland Crossroads, Hollins and Hackneyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
